name: elixir-production
description: Production-quality Elixir development system with specialized agents, progressive skills, and comprehensive workflows for enterprise maintenance, production prototyping, and rapid experimentation
author: Jeff Weiss

agents.name: elixir-architect
agents.description: High-quality feature design with architectural decisions and complexity analysis (Opus)

agents.name: elixir-reviewer
agents.description: Code review against production standards with confidence-based reporting

agents.name: phoenix-expert
agents.description: Phoenix/LiveView specialist with deep framework knowledge

agents.name: test-designer
agents.description: Comprehensive test strategy exploring entire result space with criticality scoring

agents.name: pr-reviewer
agents.description: GitHub PR integration and automated code review

agents.name: distributed-systems-expert
agents.description: Distributed systems specialist covering consensus algorithms and subtle distributed bugs (Opus)

agents.name: cognitive-scientist
agents.description: Code complexity and onboarding analysis based on Ousterhout philosophy (Opus)

skills.name: elixir-patterns
skills.description: Core Elixir patterns: railway-oriented programming, DDD, functional core/imperative shell, OTP, pattern matching

skills.name: phoenix-liveview
skills.description: Phoenix LiveView patterns: streams, forms, hooks, authentication, real-time features, common gotchas

skills.name: production-quality
skills.description: Production quality standards: typespecs, error handling, testing strategies, precommit workflows, documentation

skills.name: distributed-systems
skills.description: Distributed systems patterns: consensus algorithms (Paxos, Raft, Multi-Raft), clustering, CAP tradeoffs, common bugs

skills.name: algorithms
skills.description: Modern algorithms and data structures from recent research: probabilistic structures, cache-efficient algorithms, cutting-edge approaches

skills.name: cognitive-complexity
skills.description: Cognitive load analysis based on Ousterhout's philosophy: deep modules, reducing complexity, strategic programming

commands.name: precommit
commands.description: Run full precommit quality checks (compile, format, credo, test)

commands.name: feature
commands.description: Guided feature implementation with architecture planning and parallel exploration

commands.name: review
commands.description: Comprehensive code review against production standards

commands.name: spike-migrate
commands.description: Migrate SPIKE code to production quality

commands.name: pr-review
commands.description: Review a GitHub PR against standards

commands.name: distributed-review
commands.description: Analyze distributed system design and correctness

commands.name: algorithm-research
commands.description: Research state-of-the-art algorithms for a problem

commands.name: cognitive-audit
commands.description: Analyze code cognitive load and onboarding difficulty
